scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web,api-codegen,web-codegen -c blue,magenta,green,yellow 'cd api && bun run dev' 'cd web && bun run dev' 'cd api && bun graphql-codegen --watch' 'cd web && bun graphql-codegen --watch'
scripts.dev:test: concurrently -n api,web 'cd api && NODE_ENV=test PORT=4445 WEB_URL=http://127.0.0.1:1236 bun run dev' 'cd web && PORT=1236 bun run dev'
scripts.typecheck: cd api && bun typecheck && cd ../web && pnpm typecheck
scripts.postinstall: cd api && bun install && cd ../web && pnpm install
